headReport: Student slipped on a wet floor near the library. Minor scrape on the knee.
actionTaken: First aid administered. 'Wet Floor' sign placed. Janitor notified to dry the area.

headReport: A beehive was discovered in a tree near the Year 3 classroom. No one was stung.
actionTaken: Area was cordoned off immediately. A professional beekeeper was called and safely removed the hive after school hours.
